title: Hitler’s war with Anglo-America
itunes:title: Hitler’s war with Anglo-America
itunes:subtitle: Brendan Simms explains how Hitler’s main preoccupation was rivalry with Britain and America, rather than the Soviet Union. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Professor Brendan Simms talks to us about his new biography of Adolf Hitler, which argues that the Nazi dictator’s main preoccupation was rivalry with Britain and America, rather than the Soviet Union. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
